welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Juan de la Costa
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Juan de la Costa! This charming coastal city is known for its breathtaking beaches and delicious seafood. We invite you to relax and explore all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cañal Bajo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cañal Bajo Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Puerto Varas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Puerto Varas Airport handles the transportation of goods and products.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
